segments.text: So , you finally got your doctorate in genetics . Well done !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . Now , I have to find a job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are you thinking of doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d like to conduct some scientific research into genes . It would be wonderful to make a medical breakthrough .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There must be several private companies that are interested in employing someone like you . You could do some research for a university . There ’ s a lot of discussion about genetics nowadays . Someone wit
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Many companies and universities investing resources in genetics , because there are so many possibilities . Few people know where next discoveries will be made .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I hope scientists don ’ t decode to make a clone of me in the future ! I wouldn ’ t like to be the subject of an experiment .
segments.speaker: S1
